title: Spinach Artichoke Dip
description: Creamy cheesy dip with spinach and artichoke hearts perfect with tortilla chips or bread
ingredients: 1 package (8 oz) cream cheese softened||1/4 cup mayonnaise||1/4 cup sour cream||1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese||1/4 cup grated Romano cheese||2 cloves garlic minced||1/2 teaspoon dried basil||1/4 teaspoon garlic salt||Salt and pepper to taste||1 can (14 oz) artichoke hearts drained and chopped||1 package (10 oz) frozen chopped spinach thawed and squeezed dry||1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)||In a large bowl mix cream cheese mayonnaise sour cream Parmesan cheese Romano cheese garlic basil and garlic salt until well blended||Stir in artichoke hearts and spinach||Transfer mixture to a 9-inch pie plate or a small baking dish||Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese||Bake for 20-25 minutes until bubbly and lightly browned||Serve warm with tortilla chips pita chips or sliced baguette

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
description: Mushroom caps filled with a savory mixture of cream cheese herbs and garlic
ingredients: 24 whole fresh mushrooms stems removed||1 tablespoon vegetable oil||1 tablespoon minced garlic||8 oz cream cheese softened||1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese||1/4 teaspoon black pepper||1/4 teaspoon onion powder||1/4 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper||2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped||1/4 cup bread crumbs
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)||Clean mushrooms and carefully remove stems||Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat Add garlic and mushroom stems and cook until any moisture has evaporated||In a bowl combine cream cheese Parmesan cheese black pepper onion powder and cayenne pepper||Add cooked mushroom stems and garlic to the bowl and mix well||Fill each mushroom cap with the mixture and place on a baking sheet||Sprinkle with bread crumbs||Bake for 20 minutes until the mushrooms are tender and the filling is golden brown||Garnish with fresh parsley before serving

title: Honey Garlic Chicken Wings
description: Sweet and sticky chicken wings coated in a delicious honey garlic sauce
ingredients: 2 lbs chicken wings||2 tablespoons olive oil||1/2 teaspoon salt||1/2 teaspoon black pepper||2 teaspoons garlic powder||1/4 cup honey||1/4 cup soy sauce||3 cloves garlic minced||1 tablespoon ginger grated||2 tablespoons sriracha sauce (optional)||1 tablespoon sesame seeds (for garnish)||Green onions chopped (for garnish)
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)||In a large bowl toss chicken wings with olive oil salt pepper and garlic powder||Arrange wings on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper||Bake for 35-40 minutes turning halfway through until crispy and cooked through||While wings are baking prepare the sauce In a small saucepan combine honey soy sauce minced garlic ginger and sriracha (if using)||Simmer over medium heat for about 5 minutes until slightly thickened||When wings are done toss them in the sauce until well coated||Return to the oven for an additional 5 minutes||Garnish with sesame seeds and chopped green onions before serving

title: Vegetable Spring Rolls
description: Crispy spring rolls filled with fresh vegetables and served with sweet chili sauce
ingredients: 12 spring roll wrappers||2 cups cabbage shredded||1 carrot julienned||1/2 red bell pepper julienned||2 green onions chopped||1 cup bean sprouts||2 tablespoons soy sauce||1 tablespoon sesame oil||1 teaspoon ginger grated||2 cloves garlic minced||Vegetable oil for frying||Sweet chili sauce for dipping
instructions: In a large bowl combine cabbage carrot bell pepper green onions and bean sprouts||In a small bowl mix soy sauce sesame oil ginger and garlic||Pour sauce over vegetables and toss to combine||Place a spring roll wrapper on a clean surface with a corner pointing toward you||Place about 2 tablespoons of the filling near the corner closest to you||Fold the corner over the filling then fold in the sides and roll tightly Seal the edge with a little water||Repeat with remaining wrappers and filling||Heat vegetable oil in a deep pan to 350°F (175°C)||Fry spring rolls in batches until golden brown about 3-4 minutes per batch||Drain on paper towels and serve with sweet chili sauce

title: Fresh Guacamole
description: Simple and delicious guacamole with ripe avocados lime juice and fresh cilantro
ingredients: 3 ripe avocados||1 lime juiced||1 small onion finely diced||2 Roma tomatoes diced||3 tablespoons fresh cilantro chopped||2 cloves garlic minced||1 jalapeño seeded and minced (optional)||1/2 teaspoon salt||1/4 teaspoon ground cumin||Tortilla chips for serving
instructions: Cut avocados in half remove pits and scoop flesh into a bowl||Mash avocados with a fork to desired consistency (some like it chunky others smooth)||Add lime juice and mix well to prevent browning||Stir in onion tomatoes cilantro garlic and jalapeño (if using)||Season with salt and cumin||Taste and adjust seasoning if needed||Serve immediately with tortilla chips or refrigerate with plastic wrap pressed directly on the surface to prevent browning

title: Crispy Mozzarella Sticks
description: Golden and crispy on the outside with gooey melted cheese inside these homemade mozzarella sticks are irresistible
ingredients: 12 mozzarella string cheese sticks||1 cup all-purpose flour||2 eggs beaten||2 tablespoons milk||1 cup breadcrumbs||1 tablespoon Italian seasoning||1/2 teaspoon garlic powder||1/2 teaspoon salt||Vegetable oil for frying||Marinara sauce for dipping
instructions: Cut each string cheese in half to make 24 pieces Freeze for 30 minutes||Set up three bowls one with flour one with beaten eggs and milk and one with breadcrumbs mixed with Italian seasoning garlic powder and salt||Dip each cheese stick in flour then egg mixture then breadcrumbs||Dip in egg mixture again then breadcrumbs for a second coating||Return to freezer for at least 30 minutes or up to overnight||Heat oil to 350°F (175°C) in a deep fryer or heavy pot||Fry cheese sticks in batches for 30-45 seconds until golden brown||Drain on paper towels and serve immediately with marinara sauce

title: Bacon Wrapped Dates
description: Sweet dates filled with creamy goat cheese and wrapped in crispy bacon for an irresistible sweet and savory bite
ingredients: 24 Medjool dates pitted||4 oz goat cheese||12 slices bacon cut in half||24 toothpicks||1 tablespoon honey (optional)||1/4 teaspoon cracked black pepper
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C) Line a baking sheet with parchment paper||Stuff each date with a small amount of goat cheese||Wrap each stuffed date with a half slice of bacon and secure with a toothpick||Arrange on baking sheet leaving space between each date||Bake for 15-20 minutes until bacon is crisp turning halfway through||Transfer to a serving platter drizzle with honey if desired and sprinkle with black pepper||Serve warm

title: Classic Shrimp Cocktail
description: Perfectly cooked shrimp served with a tangy homemade cocktail sauce a timeless appetizer for any gathering
ingredients: 1 lb large shrimp peeled and deveined (tails left on)||2 quarts water||1 lemon halved||2 bay leaves||1 tablespoon salt||1 cup ketchup||2 tablespoons prepared horseradish||1 tablespoon lemon juice||1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce||1/2 teaspoon hot sauce||Lemon wedges for garnish||Fresh parsley for garnish
instructions: In a large pot combine water juice from half of the lemon bay leaves and salt Bring to a boil||Add the shrimp and cook just until pink and opaque about 2-3 minutes||Immediately transfer shrimp to a bowl of ice water to stop the cooking process||In another bowl mix ketchup horseradish lemon juice Worcestershire sauce and hot sauce||Drain and pat dry the shrimp||Arrange shrimp on a serving platter with a small bowl of cocktail sauce in the center||Garnish with lemon wedges and fresh parsley

title: Jalapeno Poppers
description: Spicy jalapeños stuffed with cream cheese and cheddar wrapped in bacon and baked until crispy
ingredients: 12 large jalapeño peppers||8 oz cream cheese softened||1 cup shredded cheddar cheese||2 green onions finely chopped||1/2 teaspoon garlic powder||1/2 teaspoon onion powder||12 slices bacon cut in half||Toothpicks
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C) Line a baking sheet with foil and place a wire rack on top||Cut jalapeños in half lengthwise and remove seeds and membranes (wear gloves!)||In a bowl combine cream cheese cheddar cheese green onions garlic powder and onion powder||Fill each jalapeño half with the cheese mixture||Wrap each stuffed jalapeño with a half slice of bacon and secure with a toothpick||Place on the prepared wire rack||Bake for 20-25 minutes until bacon is crispy and cheese is bubbly||Allow to cool slightly before serving

title: Caprese Skewers
description: Simple yet elegant appetizer featuring fresh mozzarella tomatoes and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze
ingredients: 24 cherry tomatoes||12 oz fresh mozzarella pearls||24 fresh basil leaves||1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil||2 tablespoons balsamic glaze||Salt and pepper to taste||24 small skewers or toothpicks
instructions: Thread one cherry tomato one basil leaf (folded in half) and one mozzarella pearl onto each skewer||Arrange on a serving platter||Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze||Season with salt and pepper||Serve immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve

title: BBQ Meatballs
description: Juicy meatballs simmered in a tangy homemade BBQ sauce perfect for serving with toothpicks at parties
ingredients: 1 lb ground beef||1/2 lb ground pork||1/2 cup breadcrumbs||1/4 cup milk||1 egg beaten||1/4 cup onion finely diced||2 cloves garlic minced||1 teaspoon salt||1/2 teaspoon black pepper||1 cup ketchup||1/2 cup brown sugar||2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar||1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce||1 teaspoon smoked paprika||1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper (optional)
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C) Line a baking sheet with parchment paper||In a bowl combine breadcrumbs and milk Let sit for 5 minutes||Add ground beef ground pork egg onion garlic salt and pepper Mix until just combined||Form mixture into 1-inch meatballs and place on baking sheet||Bake for 20-25 minutes until cooked through||Meanwhile in a saucepan combine ketchup brown sugar vinegar Worcestershire sauce paprika and cayenne (if using)||Simmer over medium heat for 5 minutes stirring occasionally||Transfer cooked meatballs to a slow cooker or large pot cover with sauce and simmer for 10 minutes||Serve warm with toothpicks

title: Crab Rangoon
description: Crispy wontons filled with a creamy crab and cream cheese mixture a popular Chinese-American appetizer
ingredients: 8 oz cream cheese softened||6 oz canned crab meat drained and flaked||2 green onions finely chopped||1 clove garlic minced||1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce||1/2 teaspoon soy sauce||24 wonton wrappers||1 egg beaten (for sealing)||Vegetable oil for frying||Sweet and sour sauce for dipping
instructions: In a bowl combine cream cheese crab meat green onions garlic Worcestershire sauce and soy sauce||Place a wonton wrapper on a flat surface and add about 1 tablespoon of filling to the center||Brush the edges with beaten egg then fold the wrapper diagonally to form a triangle Press the edges to seal||Bring the two opposite corners together and press to seal (should look like a little purse)||Repeat with remaining wrappers and filling||Heat oil to 350°F (175°C) in a deep fryer or heavy pot||Fry rangoons in batches until golden brown about 2-3 minutes||Drain on paper towels and serve hot with sweet and sour sauce

title: Deviled Eggs
description: Creamy tangy deviled eggs garnished with paprika a timeless and elegant appetizer for any occasion
ingredients: 12 large eggs||1/2 cup mayonnaise||1 tablespoon Dijon mustard||1 tablespoon white vinegar||1/4 teaspoon salt||1/8 teaspoon black pepper||Paprika for garnish||Fresh chives chopped (optional)
instructions: Place eggs in a single layer in a saucepan and cover with water about 1 inch above eggs||Bring to a boil then remove from heat cover and let sit for 12 minutes||Transfer eggs to an ice bath to cool then peel||Cut eggs in half lengthwise and remove yolks to a bowl||Mash yolks with a fork then add mayonnaise mustard vinegar salt and pepper Mix until smooth||Spoon or pipe the yolk mixture back into the egg whites||Sprinkle with paprika and chives (if using)||Refrigerate until ready to serve

title: Hummus Platter
description: Creamy homemade hummus served with an assortment of vegetables olives and pita bread for dipping
ingredients: 2 cans (15 oz each) chickpeas drained and rinsed||1/3 cup tahini||1/4 cup lemon juice||3 cloves garlic minced||2 tablespoons olive oil plus more for drizzling||1/2 teaspoon ground cumin||1/2 teaspoon salt||2-3 tablespoons water||Paprika for garnish||Fresh parsley chopped||Assorted vegetables for dipping (carrots cucumbers bell peppers)||Kalamata olives||Feta cheese crumbled||Pita bread cut into wedges
instructions: In a food processor combine chickpeas tahini lemon juice garlic olive oil cumin and salt||Process until smooth adding water as needed to reach desired consistency||Transfer hummus to a serving bowl and create a well in the center||Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with paprika and parsley||Arrange vegetables olives feta cheese and pita wedges around the hummus||Serve immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve

title: Loaded Potato Skins
description: Crispy potato skins loaded with cheese bacon and green onions topped with sour cream for the ultimate comfort food appetizer
ingredients: 6 medium russet potatoes scrubbed clean||2 tablespoons olive oil||1 tablespoon salt||1/2 teaspoon garlic powder||1/2 teaspoon paprika||1 1/2 cups shredded cheddar cheese||8 slices bacon cooked and crumbled||4 green onions sliced||1/2 cup sour cream||Black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C) Poke potatoes with a fork and rub with 1 tablespoon of olive oil||Bake potatoes directly on oven rack for 45-60 minutes until tender Let cool slightly||Cut potatoes in half lengthwise and scoop out the middle leaving about 1/4 inch of potato on the skin||Increase oven temperature to 450°F (230°C)||Brush both sides of potato skins with remaining olive oil and place skin-side up on a baking sheet||Sprinkle with salt garlic powder and paprika||Bake for 10 minutes then flip and bake another 10 minutes until crispy||Fill each skin with cheese and bacon then return to oven for 2-3 minutes until cheese melts||Top with green onions and a dollop of sour cream Season with black pepper

title: Ultimate Nachos
description: Crispy tortilla chips loaded with beans cheese jalapeños and fresh toppings for a crowd-pleasing appetizer
ingredients: 12 oz tortilla chips||1 can (15 oz) black beans drained and rinsed||1 can (15 oz) refried beans||2 cups shredded Mexican blend cheese||1 cup chunky salsa||1/2 cup black olives sliced||2 jalapeños sliced (seeds removed for less heat)||1 tomato diced||1/2 red onion finely diced||1 avocado diced||1/4 cup fresh cilantro chopped||1/2 cup sour cream||1 lime cut into wedges
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)||Spread tortilla chips in a single layer on a large oven-safe platter or baking sheet||In a small bowl mix black beans and refried beans then spread over chips||Sprinkle cheese evenly over the beans and chips||Bake for 5-7 minutes until cheese is fully melted||Remove from oven and top with salsa olives jalapeños tomato red onion and avocado||Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with sour cream and lime wedges on the side

title: Fruit Skewers with Honey Yogurt Dip
description: Colorful skewers of fresh seasonal fruits served with a sweet honey yogurt dipping sauce
ingredients: 1 pineapple cut into chunks||2 cups strawberries hulled||2 kiwis peeled and cut into chunks||1 cantaloupe cut into chunks||1 cup red grapes||1 cup green grapes||2 bananas sliced into 1-inch pieces||1 cup plain Greek yogurt||3 tablespoons honey||1 teaspoon vanilla extract||1/4 teaspoon cinnamon||12-15 wooden skewers
instructions: Thread various fruit pieces onto wooden skewers alternating colors for visual appeal||Arrange skewers on a serving platter||In a small bowl mix Greek yogurt honey vanilla extract and cinnamon until well combined||Serve fruit skewers with yogurt dip on the side||For best results prepare just before serving to keep fruit fresh

title: Crispy Falafel Bites
description: Crispy bite-sized falafel patties served with a creamy tahini sauce for dipping
ingredients: 2 cups canned chickpeas drained and rinsed||1/2 onion roughly chopped||3 cloves garlic||1/4 cup fresh parsley||1/4 cup fresh cilantro||1 teaspoon cumin||1 teaspoon coriander||1/2 teaspoon baking soda||3 tablespoons all-purpose flour||1 teaspoon salt||1/2 teaspoon black pepper||Vegetable oil for frying||1/4 cup tahini||2 tablespoons lemon juice||1 clove garlic minced||3 tablespoons water||Salt to taste
instructions: In a food processor combine chickpeas onion garlic parsley and cilantro Pulse until finely minced but not pureed||Transfer mixture to a bowl and add cumin coriander baking soda flour salt and pepper Mix well||Form mixture into small balls about 1 inch in diameter then flatten slightly||Heat oil in a deep pan to 350°F (175°C)||Fry falafel in batches until golden brown about 2-3 minutes per batch||Drain on paper towels||For the tahini sauce whisk together tahini lemon juice minced garlic water and salt until smooth||Serve falafel bites hot with tahini sauce for dipping

title: Mushroom Turnovers
description: Flaky pastry turnovers filled with a savory mushroom and herb mixture
ingredients: 2 sheets puff pastry thawed||1 lb mushrooms (cremini or button) finely chopped||2 tablespoons olive oil||3 cloves garlic minced||2 shallots finely chopped||2 tablespoons fresh thyme leaves||1 tablespoon fresh rosemary chopped||1/4 cup vegetable broth||2 tablespoons all-purpose flour||1/4 cup cream cheese||1/2 teaspoon salt||1/4 teaspoon black pepper||1 egg beaten (for egg wash)||Sesame seeds for garnish
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C) Line a baking sheet with parchment paper||In a large skillet heat olive oil over medium heat Add shallots and cook until softened about 2 minutes||Add mushrooms and garlic cook until mushrooms release their moisture and it evaporates about 7-8 minutes||Stir in thyme and rosemary Sprinkle flour over mixture and stir to combine||Add vegetable broth and cook until thickened about 2 minutes||Remove from heat stir in cream cheese until melted Season with salt and pepper Let cool||Roll out puff pastry sheets and cut each into 9 equal squares||Place a spoonful of mushroom mixture in the center of each square||Fold pastry over filling to form triangles and seal edges with a fork||Brush with beaten egg and sprinkle with sesame seeds||Bake for 15-20 minutes until golden brown and puffed||Allow to cool slightly before serving

title: Crispy Samosas
description: Crispy pastry triangles filled with spiced potatoes and peas a popular Indian appetizer
ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour||1/2 teaspoon salt||4 tablespoons vegetable oil||1/2 cup water||3 medium potatoes boiled and diced||1 cup green peas||2 tablespoons vegetable oil||1 teaspoon cumin seeds||1 onion finely chopped||2 cloves garlic minced||1 tablespoon ginger grated||1 green chili finely chopped (optional)||1 teaspoon ground cumin||1 teaspoon ground coriander||1/2 teaspoon turmeric||1/2 teaspoon garam masala||2 tablespoons fresh cilantro chopped||Salt to taste||Oil for deep frying||Mint chutney for serving
instructions: For the dough mix flour and salt in a bowl Add oil and rub until mixture resembles breadcrumbs||Gradually add water and knead to form a firm dough Cover and let rest for 30 minutes||For the filling heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds When they splutter add onion garlic ginger and green chili||Cook until onions are golden brown then add ground spices and cook for 1 minute||Add potatoes and peas mix well Season with salt and cook for 3-4 minutes||Stir in cilantro and remove from heat Let the filling cool completely||Divide the dough into 10-12 equal portions Roll each portion into a circle about 6 inches in diameter||Cut each circle in half Wet the straight edge with water and form a cone||Fill the cone with about 2 tablespoons of the potato mixture||Seal the open edge by pressing firmly||Heat oil to 350°F (175°C) and deep fry samosas until golden brown about 3-4 minutes per batch||Drain on paper towels and serve hot with mint chutney

title: Avocado Toast Bites
description: Bite-sized pieces of toasted baguette topped with creamy avocado cherry tomatoes and a sprinkle of everything bagel seasoning
ingredients: 1 baguette sliced into 1/2-inch rounds||3 tablespoons olive oil||2 ripe avocados||1 tablespoon lemon juice||1/2 teaspoon salt||1/4 teaspoon black pepper||1 cup cherry tomatoes halved||2 tablespoons red onion finely diced||2 tablespoons everything bagel seasoning||Fresh microgreens for garnish (optional)
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)||Brush baguette slices with olive oil on both sides and place on a baking sheet||Bake for 5-7 minutes until lightly toasted||In a bowl mash avocados with lemon juice salt and pepper||Spread avocado mixture on toasted baguette slices||Top each with cherry tomato halves and diced red onion||Sprinkle with everything bagel seasoning||Garnish with microgreens if desired||Serve immediately

title: Sweet Potato Chickpea Bites
description: Roasted sweet potato rounds topped with a flavorful chickpea and herb salad
ingredients: 2 large sweet potatoes sliced into 1/2-inch rounds||2 tablespoons olive oil||1 teaspoon salt||1/2 teaspoon paprika||1 can (15 oz) chickpeas drained and rinsed||1/4 cup red bell pepper finely diced||1/4 cup cucumber finely diced||2 tablespoons red onion finely diced||2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped||1 tablespoon fresh mint chopped||2 tablespoons lemon juice||1 tablespoon olive oil||1/2 teaspoon cumin||1/4 teaspoon salt||1/4 teaspoon black pepper
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C) Line a baking sheet with parchment paper||Toss sweet potato rounds with olive oil salt and paprika||Arrange in a single layer on baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes flipping halfway through until tender and slightly crispy on edges||Meanwhile in a bowl combine chickpeas bell pepper cucumber red onion parsley and mint||In a small bowl whisk together lemon juice olive oil cumin salt and pepper||Pour dressing over chickpea mixture and toss to combine||Once sweet potatoes are done let cool slightly then top each round with a spoonful of chickpea salad||Arrange on a serving platter and serve warm or at room temperature

title: Crispy Zucchini Fritters
description: Golden crispy zucchini fritters served with a cool yogurt dipping sauce
ingredients: 2 medium zucchini grated||1 teaspoon salt plus more to taste||1/4 cup all-purpose flour||1/4 cup cornstarch||2 green onions finely chopped||2 tablespoons fresh dill chopped||1 clove garlic minced||1 egg beaten||1/4 teaspoon black pepper||Vegetable oil for frying||1 cup plain Greek yogurt||1 tablespoon lemon juice||1 tablespoon fresh mint chopped||1/2 teaspoon garlic powder||Salt and pepper to taste
instructions: Place grated zucchini in a colander sprinkle with 1 teaspoon salt and let sit for 10 minutes||Squeeze out as much moisture as possible from the zucchini using a clean kitchen towel||In a large bowl combine zucchini flour cornstarch green onions dill garlic egg and pepper||Heat 1/4 inch of oil in a large skillet over medium heat||Drop heaping tablespoons of batter into the hot oil and flatten slightly||Cook for 2-3 minutes per side until golden brown and crispy||Drain on paper towels and sprinkle with salt while still hot||For the sauce mix Greek yogurt lemon juice mint garlic powder salt and pepper||Serve fritters hot with yogurt sauce on the side

title: Watermelon Feta Skewers
description: Refreshing skewers with sweet watermelon tangy feta cheese and fresh mint drizzled with balsamic glaze
ingredients: 1 small watermelon cut into 1-inch cubes||8 oz feta cheese cut into 1/2-inch cubes||1/4 cup fresh mint leaves||3 tablespoons balsamic glaze||2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil||Freshly ground black pepper||24 small skewers or toothpicks
instructions: Thread a watermelon cube followed by a mint leaf and then a feta cube onto each skewer||Arrange on a serving platter||Drizzle with balsamic glaze and olive oil||Finish with a sprinkle of freshly ground black pepper||Serve immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve (no more than 1 hour)

title: Smoky Baba Ganoush
description: Creamy smoky eggplant dip served with homemade crispy pita chips
ingredients: 2 large eggplants||3 tablespoons tahini||2 cloves garlic minced||2 tablespoons lemon juice||1 tablespoon olive oil plus more for drizzling||1/2 teaspoon ground cumin||1/4 teaspoon smoked paprika plus more for garnish||Salt and pepper to taste||2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped||6 pita breads||2 tablespoons olive oil||1 teaspoon za'atar seasoning (optional)
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C)||Prick eggplants all over with a fork and place on a baking sheet||Roast for 30-40 minutes until skin is charred and flesh is soft||Let cool then cut in half and scoop out the flesh into a colander Let drain for 10 minutes||Transfer eggplant to a food processor Add tahini garlic lemon juice olive oil cumin smoked paprika salt and pepper||Pulse until smooth but still slightly textured||For pita chips reduce oven to 375°F (190°C)||Cut each pita into 8 triangles Brush with olive oil and sprinkle with za'atar if using||Bake for 10-12 minutes until crispy and golden||Serve baba ganoush in a bowl drizzled with olive oil sprinkled with smoked paprika and parsley with pita chips on the side

title: Cucumber Cream Cheese Canapes
description: Fresh cucumber rounds topped with herb-infused cream cheese and garnished with radish and dill
ingredients: 2 English cucumbers||8 oz cream cheese softened||2 tablespoons fresh dill chopped||2 tablespoons fresh chives chopped||1 tablespoon lemon zest||1 clove garlic minced||Salt and pepper to taste||4 radishes thinly sliced||Fresh dill sprigs for garnish||Paprika for dusting
instructions: Slice cucumbers into 1/4-inch thick rounds||In a bowl combine cream cheese dill chives lemon zest garlic salt and pepper||Using a small spoon or piping bag add a dollop of the cream cheese mixture onto each cucumber round||Top each with a radish slice and a small sprig of dill||Dust lightly with paprika for color||Arrange on a serving platter and refrigerate until ready to serve

title: Crispy Vegetable Pakoras
description: Crispy Indian fritters made with assorted vegetables in a spiced chickpea batter
ingredients: 1 cup chickpea flour (besan)||1/2 teaspoon baking powder||1 teaspoon ground cumin||1 teaspoon ground coriander||1/2 teaspoon turmeric||1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper||1/2 teaspoon salt||3/4 cup water||1 small onion thinly sliced||1 potato thinly sliced||1 bell pepper thinly sliced||1 cup spinach leaves||1/4 cup fresh cilantro chopped||1 green chili finely chopped (optional)||Vegetable oil for deep frying||Mint chutney for serving
instructions: In a large bowl combine chickpea flour baking powder cumin coriander turmeric cayenne pepper and salt||Gradually add water whisking to form a smooth batter (consistency of thick pancake batter)||Add vegetables cilantro and green chili if using Mix well to coat all vegetables||Heat oil in a deep pan or wok to 350°F (175°C)||Drop spoonfuls of the vegetable mixture into the hot oil||Fry in batches for 3-4 minutes until golden brown and crispy||Drain on paper towels and serve hot with mint chutney

title: Almond Stuffed Dates
description: Sweet Medjool dates stuffed with crunchy almonds and brightened with orange zest
ingredients: 24 Medjool dates||24 whole almonds roasted and unsalted||1 orange zested||1/4 teaspoon cinnamon||2 tablespoons honey||2 tablespoons pistachios finely chopped (for garnish)
instructions: Make a lengthwise slit in each date and remove the pit||Insert an almond into each date||Arrange dates on a serving plate||In a small bowl mix orange zest and cinnamon||Drizzle honey over the dates||Sprinkle
